Package gui_cems

Class GuiCommon

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui_cems.GuiCommon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddTimeToExamController, CreateActiveExamController, CreateExam_step1Controller, CreateQuestionController, EditExam_questionsStep2Controller, EditExamController, EditManualExamStep2, EditQuestionController, EnterToExamController, ExamBankController, ExamCopyController, LoginController, PrincipalDisplayReporByController, PrincipalDisplayReporByStudentController, PrincipalGetReportsController, QuestionBankController, ScoreApprovalController, StartManualExamController, TeacherStatisticsController, UploadManualExam, ViewExamController
    public class GuiCommon
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains functions common to different classes that inherit from it. With the help of this department the reuse mechanism is implemented.
    Author:
    Hadar Iluz, Matar Asaf

      • displayNextScreen

        public void displayNextScreen​(User userObj,
                              java.lang.String fxmlName)
        The method loads the desired right screen to which you want to move.
        Parameters:
        userObj - input to identify the user who wants to switch to the screen
        fxmlName - input is the screen Name of the XML file of the screen to which you are moving by loading it
